Package scheduler.view.view_ui

Companion view classes for the View package used for viewing schedules and related information.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AdvancedFilterUI AdvancedFilterUUI is the companion view for the AdvancedFilter model class.
CalendarViewUI Displaying a schedule in a calendar mode
FilterOptionCheckBoxListener Class FilterOptionCheckBoxListener defines the item listener that is attached to each filter options checkbox in a schedule view.
FilterOptionsUI Companion view class for FilterOptions.
ListViewRow The class ListViewRow is a container of a ScheduleItem and its form as row data in the list view table.
ListViewUI Class ListViewUI provides a view of a Schedule in list mode.
ManualEditListener * Class
OKViewScheduleButtonListener Class OKViewScheduleButtonListener defines the action listener that is attached to the OK button in the course schedule dialog.
ScheduleItemUI Class ScheduleItemUI is hte companion view class for a ScheduleItem.
ViewLevelUI The companion view class for the current view level of the schedule view.
ViewMenu Class ViewMenu is the pulldown menu view of the model class.
ViewModeUI The companion view for class for the current view mode of the schedule view.
ViewSettingsUI Class ViewSettingsUI provides a view of ViewSettings as an input to the viewSchedule method.
ViewTypeFilterCheckBoxListener Class ViewTypeFilterCheckBoxListener defines the item listener that is attached to each course, instructor, or location checkbox in a schedule view.
ViewTypeFilterUI Class ViewTypeFilterUI provides a panel with a checkbox for each course.
ViewUI Initial version of ViewUI class that constructs and composes its pulldown menu and some dialogs.
 

Package scheduler.view.view_ui Description

Companion view classes for the View package used for viewing schedules and related information.
